price: Lalle ne a cikin sammai da ƙasa akwai ãyõyi* ga mãsu ĩmãni.
arabic: إِنَّ فِي ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِ لَأٓيَٰتٖ لِّلۡمُؤۡمِنِينَ
footnotes: * Ãya, ita ce alãma mai jan hankalin mutum zuwa ga shiriya. Jam'inta, shi ne ãyõyi.

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: inna fī al-samāwāti wal-arḍi laāyātin lil'mu'minīna
